network.objects

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.objects.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    this class provides several methods for generating Strings or modifying them. In general it uses the given AbstractOrganizerObject to generate the GET-Commands.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steffen Baumann

      • buildLoginCommand

        public static java.lang.String buildLoginCommand(java.lang.String mail,
                                 java.lang.String password)
        Creates the Login-Command from the mail address and password
        Parameters:
        mail - user to login
        password - linked to the mail address
        Returns:
        the GET-Command for a login

      • encodeString

        public static java.lang.String encodeString(java.lang.String string)
        Encodes a String in 3 steps:
        1. Create the SHA-512 hash value
        2. Create an ASCII String from hash
        3. Encode the ASCII String with Base64
        Parameters:
        string - to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded String

      • addUserAuth

        public static java.lang.String addUserAuth(java.lang.String cmd,
                           java.lang.String authString)
        Adds the RequestHandler.authString to the given command.
        Parameters:
        cmd - to be sent
        authString - of the current logged in user
        Returns:
        GET-Command with authentication
